active.description: Indicates if the email configuration is active or not.

group_id.description: ID of the group associated with the email configuration.

id.description: Unique identifier for the email configuration.

name.description: Name given to the email configuration.

primary_role.description: Primary role assigned to the email configuration.

product_id.description: ID of the product linked to the email configuration.

reply_email.description: Email address used for replying to emails.

to_email.description: Email address to which emails are sent.

created_at.description: Timestamp for when the email configuration was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp for the last update made to the email configuration.
